episode_event_specialcos06/4001_1001_010: That’s my master! He stands out above all the rest!
episode_event_specialcos06/4001_1001_020:
Whaaat?! The Masked Royal is definitely in the
spotlight more!
episode_event_specialcos06/4001_1001_030: No way! My master is, for sure!
episode_event_specialcos06/4001_1001_050:
The crowd’s so worked up! It’d be a waste to
finish here!
episode_event_specialcos06/4001_1001_060:
Anyone here wanna show off their fighting spirit in
front of everyone, like we just did?!
episode_event_specialcos06/4001_1001_070: Is this our chance to become heroes?!
episode_event_specialcos06/4001_1001_080:
Yeah! Maybe this’ll help us look as cool as
they do!
episode_event_specialcos06/4001_1001_100:
Oh-ho! A round of applause for the brave
challengers!
episode_event_specialcos06/4001_1001_110: Am I witnessing...a new hero origin story?!
episode_event_specialcos06/6801_1031_010:
Protect the weak and
defeat evil!
episode_event_specialcos06/6801_1001_010:
We shouldn’t just look the part—we gotta actually
do a bunch of heroic stuff, too!
episode_event_specialcos06/6801_1001_020:
Yeah! A hero’s gotta be cool right down to
their core!
episode_event_specialcos06/6801_1001_030: We won’t let villains run rampant on Pasio!
episode_event_specialcos06/4002_1001_010: We’ll finish this battle in no time!
episode_event_specialcos06/4002_1001_100: Huh? The crowd doesn’t look as excited anymore...
episode_event_specialcos06/4002_1001_110:
That’s weird... I thought being strong was all it
took to become a hero.
episode_event_specialcos06/4002_1001_120: Oh yeah... You two are strong, all right!
episode_event_specialcos06/4002_1001_130:
But take it from me, someone who’s been thrilling
audiences with exciting battles for a while now—
you’re also missing something!
episode_event_specialcos06/4002_1001_150:
And if you can figure out what that is...we’ll take
you both on!
episode_event_specialcos06/4002_1001_160: Really?! We’ll get to battle you two?!
episode_event_specialcos06/4002_1001_170: Yes! A fighter never goes back on his word!
episode_event_specialcos06/4002_1001_180: All right! I’ll hold you to that promise, master!
episode_event_specialcos06/4003_1101_010:
And so, Barry and Selene started training
frantically, but...
episode_event_specialcos06/4003_1001_030:
Our training is making us stronger...but we still
haven’t figured out what that “something” is.
episode_event_specialcos06/4003_1001_040:
(I want to give them advice, but they might think
I’m a bother...)
episode_event_specialcos06/4003_1001_050: (No...I have to take that first step!)
episode_event_specialcos06/4003_1001_070:
I’m just a hero fan who happened to be
passing by...
episode_event_specialcos06/4003_1001_090: Don’t think I’ve seen you around.
episode_event_specialcos06/4003_1001_100: Umm... I’m Penny, a student from Paldea...
episode_event_specialcos06/4003_1001_110:
So, yeah... When I saw you two battle earlier,
there was something that stood out to me...
episode_event_specialcos06/4003_1001_120:
And I thought I might be able to give you a tip
from a fan’s perspective...
episode_event_specialcos06/4003_1001_160: F-first, I’d like to ask you two something...
episode_event_specialcos06/4003_1001_170: What does being a hero mean to you?
episode_event_specialcos06/4003_1001_180: Well, being strong and cool, of course!
episode_event_specialcos06/4003_1001_210:
You’re not wrong, but there’s more to being a
hero than just being strong!
episode_event_specialcos06/4003_1001_220:
You also need to inspire hope, courage, and
energy in the people watching you!
episode_event_specialcos06/4003_1001_230:
You’ve gotta get the audience really fired up!
THAT’s what it means to be a hero!
episode_event_specialcos06/4003_1001_250: Of course! That’s what we’re missing!
episode_event_specialcos06/4003_1001_260: We need to think about the audience!
episode_event_specialcos06/4003_1001_270:
That’s right! When you’re putting on a show,
getting the audience emotionally invested is key!
episode_event_specialcos06/4003_1001_280:
That means riveting plot twists to keep us on the
edge of our seats! Drawing us in deeper and
deeper until—!
episode_event_specialcos06/4003_1001_310:
Y-yeah... Watching lots of hero shows is one of
my indoor hobbies...
episode_event_specialcos06/4003_1001_320: Oooh! Tell us more about that!
episode_event_specialcos06/4003_1001_330: Yeah! What kind of heroes do you like?
episode_event_specialcos06/4003_1001_340: All right, then. I’ll keep geeking out about heroes.
episode_event_specialcos06/4003_1001_350:
But when I’m done, I want to hear about your
favorite heroes, too.
episode_event_specialcos06/4004_1001_020:
So, basically, you’ve come to us to see if our
experience could help you out?
episode_event_specialcos06/4004_1001_030:
Yes! Penny said that if we wanted tips on how to
make our matches more interesting...
episode_event_specialcos06/4004_1001_040: we should talk to Gym Leaders from Galar!
episode_event_specialcos06/4004_1001_050:
You have superexciting battles in your stadiums,
right?
episode_event_specialcos06/4004_1001_060: Sure do. Penny knows what she’s talking about.
episode_event_specialcos06/4004_1001_070: Hehe... Well, my family does hail from Galar.
episode_event_specialcos06/4004_1001_080:
You’re both popular for your ability to get the
crowd going, so...if you have any advice...
episode_event_specialcos06/4004_1001_090:
Of course! I can teach you all sorts of things! First
of all...
episode_event_specialcos06/4004_1001_100:
Oh yeah, you two are teaming up for your next
match, aren’t you?
episode_event_specialcos06/4004_1001_110:
In that case, you’ll have to work together as a
tag team!
episode_event_specialcos06/4004_1001_130:
For example, when Raihan and I team up, he
throws down a sandstorm...
episode_event_specialcos06/4004_1001_140:
...And I support Gordie’s Pokémon! With our
dynamic teamwork, we get the whole crowd
involved and up on their feet!
episode_event_specialcos06/4004_1001_150:
If we pull it off perfectly, the crowd’s eyes are
glued to us!
episode_event_specialcos06/4004_1001_160: So we need a tag-team move, huh?
episode_event_specialcos06/4004_1001_170:
Always keep in mind what the crowd most wants
to see!
episode_event_specialcos06/4004_1001_180:
If you think about the heroes you admire and how
they battle...you’ll figure it out, I’m sure!
episode_event_specialcos06/4005_1101_010: Next, Barry and Selene trained with Palmer...
episode_event_specialcos06/4005_1001_020: Nice! Seems like you’re both getting it!
episode_event_specialcos06/4005_1001_050:
I got curious and came to check in on you both...
Looking good, you two!
episode_event_specialcos06/4005_1001_060: I can’t wait until the day of the match!
episode_event_specialcos06/4005_1001_070: Are you coming to watch us, too, Professor?
episode_event_specialcos06/4005_1001_100: No problem at all! Now, let’s carry on!
episode_event_specialcos06/4005_1001_110:
There’s more to making a battle exciting than just
going all out and winning!
episode_event_specialcos06/4005_1001_120:
For example, in the Battle Tower, I adjust the
strength of my attacks based on my opponent’s
win streak.
episode_event_specialcos06/4005_1001_130:
By doing that, I draw out the challenger’s strength
and encourage their growth!
episode_event_specialcos06/4005_1001_140: Your battle theater should follow the same idea.
episode_event_specialcos06/4005_1001_150:
If you can draw out your opponent’s strength, I
bet you the crowd would go wild!
episode_event_specialcos06/4005_1001_160:
Yeah! Like pretending you’re in a pinch and
trading the advantage back and forth with the
opponent!
episode_event_specialcos06/4005_1001_170:
Hey, you know your stuff! One way to do that is,
instead of dodging a move...
episode_event_specialcos06/4005_1001_180:
you take the hit and show the crowd just how
strong you and your opponent are!
episode_event_specialcos06/4005_1001_190: I see! Let’s try that as well!
episode_event_specialcos06/4005_1001_200: Go on—you can be all that you desire!
episode_event_specialcos06/4006_1001_010:
So, to recap the advice we got from Professor
Kukui and Palmer...
episode_event_specialcos06/4006_1001_020:
Instead of a one-sided battle, we need to add
variety by getting into pinches from time to time!
episode_event_specialcos06/4006_1001_030:
But that doesn’t mean we should take it easy
on purpose, either...
episode_event_specialcos06/4006_1001_040:
We need a way to come back from a pinch
and win...
episode_event_specialcos06/4006_1001_060: to show off your finishing moves!
episode_event_specialcos06/4007_1001_010:
Why don’t you pick a finishing move to spice up
your match?
episode_event_specialcos06/4007_1001_020:
A finishing move, huh... In Alola, they have
Z-moves.
episode_event_specialcos06/4007_1001_030: And on Pasio, I guess it’s sync moves?
episode_event_specialcos06/4007_1001_040:
But everyone here uses sync moves, so those
wouldn’t have much of an impact, would they?
episode_event_specialcos06/4007_1001_060:
Even simple punches and kicks can get pretty
flashy, thanks to how special effects have gotten
better over time...
episode_event_specialcos06/4007_1001_070:
And even a well-known move can be exciting if
someone unexpected uses it!
episode_event_specialcos06/4007_1001_080: Something people wouldn’t expect us to do...
episode_event_specialcos06/4007_1001_100:
Heracross and Scizor have Mega Evolutions,
don’t they?
episode_event_specialcos06/4007_1001_120:
Heracross and I made it through a whole
adventure in Sinnoh together as partners...
episode_event_specialcos06/4007_1001_130:
but if we could get a new power like Mega
Evolution, that would be so cool—even for me!
episode_event_specialcos06/4007_1001_150:
A longtime partner getting a buff, huh... Nice.
That hits you right in the feels.
episode_event_specialcos06/4007_1001_160: How did you and Scizor meet, Selene?
episode_event_specialcos06/4007_1001_170:
She and I met when I came to Pasio and traded
Pokémon with Elio.
episode_event_specialcos06/4007_1001_180:
Apparently Elio’s Scyther had a Metal Coat item
that she brought with her everywhere.
episode_event_specialcos06/4007_1001_190:
And when Elio traded Scyther while she was
holding it, she evolved into Scizor!
episode_event_specialcos06/4007_1001_200: Ahh! So it’s a Pokémon that evolves by trading!
episode_event_specialcos06/4007_1001_210: At the time, it really shocked me!
episode_event_specialcos06/4007_1001_220:
Maybe by using Mega Evolution, I could feel that
shock again!
episode_event_specialcos06/4007_1001_230: Let’s give Mega Evolution our best shot, Scizor!
episode_event_specialcos06/4007_1001_240:
All right! Let’s begin our hardcore training to
perfect our finishing moves!
episode_event_specialcos06/4008_1001_010: Hehe! Our training went really well!
episode_event_specialcos06/4008_1001_020: I’m even more excited for the match!
episode_event_specialcos06/4008_1001_030:
Looks like you’ve come a long way since we last
saw you!
episode_event_specialcos06/4008_1001_050:
In recognition of your progress, these outfits are
for you!
episode_event_specialcos06/4008_1001_060: As promised, WE will be your next opponents!
episode_event_specialcos06/4008_1001_070: Finally, we can battle you both!
episode_event_specialcos06/4008_1001_090:
Is this it?! The moment when the first generation
of heroes passes the torch—costumes, convictions,
and everything?!
episode_event_specialcos06/4008_1001_100:
And when this new generation of heroes emerges
victorious, their predecessors can then retire with
no regrets—
episode_event_specialcos06/4008_1001_110:
Whoa, whoa, whoa! Who said anything about
retiring?!
episode_event_specialcos06/4008_1001_120:
We’ve been searching for the answer to the
question, “what is a hero?”
episode_event_specialcos06/4008_1001_130:
And in our tag-team match, we’ll show you what
we found!
episode_event_specialcos06/4009_1001_020:
Hello, youngsters! Looking a little better
than before!
episode_event_specialcos06/4009_1001_030:
Let’s see what the next generation of heroes
can do!
episode_event_specialcos06/4009_1001_050: We’ll hit you with our full strength, turned up to Z!
episode_event_specialcos06/4009_1001_060:
There’s the determination! Come at us head-on,
fair and square!
episode_event_specialcos06/4009_1001_070: We’re gonna take all your attacks—and STILL win!
episode_event_specialcos06/4009_1001_100: Bring it on, master! We’ll take your attack too!
episode_event_specialcos06/4009_1001_170: Yeah! Let’s hit them with a big one!
episode_event_specialcos06/4009_1001_210: Looks like this is the end for you!
episode_event_specialcos06/4009_1001_240: We’ll stay strong to the end!
episode_event_specialcos06/4009_1001_250: Still got some fight left in you, huh?
episode_event_specialcos06/4009_1001_260:
It’s now or never! Time to bust out our finishing
move!
episode_event_specialcos06/4009_1001_300:
When the odds are against us, your mighty horn
can turn it around!
episode_event_specialcos06/4009_1001_310:
By the red steel of justice, evil shall be crushed!
Ready...fight!
episode_event_specialcos06/4009_1001_320:
I didn’t realize they had this much power
hidden away!
episode_event_specialcos06/4010_1001_030: Of course it was! I’m your apprentice, after all!
episode_event_specialcos06/4010_1001_040:
Like I told you before, I don’t remember agreeing
to you being my apprentice!
episode_event_specialcos06/4010_1001_050: But...I guess I can accept you as a rival!
episode_event_specialcos06/4010_1001_060: Master, could you write us a theme song, too?
episode_event_specialcos06/4010_1001_070: Hngh! You’ve got a lotta nerve!
episode_event_specialcos06/4010_1001_080:
Hahaha! I see all that training with Palmer and
Penny paid off!
episode_event_specialcos06/4010_1001_090: Hm? How do you know about that?
episode_event_specialcos06/4010_1001_110:
From this day forward, we’re allies who protect
the peace on Pasio!
episode_event_specialcos06/4010_1001_120: A round of applause for the winners!
episode_event_specialcos06/4010_1001_130:
We’re gonna keep working hard as heroes from
here on out!
episode_event_specialcos06/4010_1001_140: We’ll liven up Pasio with all our might!
episode_event_specialcos06/4011_1001_020: I wonder when our next match is...
episode_event_specialcos06/4011_1001_030:
They told us to look forward to it, but we can’t
wait forever.
episode_event_specialcos06/4011_1001_040: They can’t just prepare it straight away, can they?
episode_event_specialcos06/4011_1001_050: I bet it takes time to arrange an opponent...
episode_event_specialcos06/4011_1001_070:
The Masked Royal and Crasher Wake have been
defeated by an unknown villain!
episode_event_specialcos06/4011_1001_110:
The classic scenario in which a new enemy
appears after defeating a strong opponent!
episode_event_specialcos06/4011_1101_120: Who could this unknown villain be?
episode_event_specialcos06/4011_1101_130:
And what future awaits the two who have grown
into full-fledged heroes?
